channel.title: Vogel on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Vogel on Martin's Blog

item.title: Skiing on Vogel
item.description: Started off while it was still dark. Plan A was going to ski on Krvavec. No plan B at that time. Just as we left Cerklje there was a suspicious hold-up in the traffic which turned out to be due to the great number of cars - all heading for the same ski resort. My friend and I parked just soon after Cerklje , where the buses usually park.
